name: Nodegem WebApi
description: The backbone of the Nodegem program. It's the middleman between the web client and the client services.

AppSettings:Host.description: The host domain for where the front-end will live. (If self-hosted then set this value to whatever heroku gives you as a domain)

AppSettings:SecretKey.description: Secret key used value encryption and decryption

TokenSettings:Issuer.description: The domain that heroku gives you.

CorsSettings:AllowedHosts.description: Domains that are allowed to hit your api. (Comma seperated)

selfHosted.description: Is this site also hosting the front-end? (true/false)

PROCFILE.description: Which app do you want to run? (WebApi/Procfile or ClientService/Procfile)

ENDPOINT.description: Domain to connect to Nodegem API
